author: Stereogum
title: The Mountain Goats – “Andrew Eldritch Is Moving Back To Leeds”
text: A couple of weeks ago, the Mountain Goats frontman John Darnielle published Universal Harvester , his second novel (or, if you count the novella he published about a kid in a psychiatric hospital who needs his Black Sabbath tape to survive -- which I totally do -- his third). It's a deeply creepy and oddly … More »
